slides.title: Title & Mission
bullets: One-liner: Liquidity & trust layer for under-utilized space.

slides.title: Problem
bullets: Fragmented trust ➜ high friction booking decisions.

slides.title: Solution
bullets: Adaptive trust + dynamic liquidity engine (beyond static listings).

slides.title: Market Opportunity
bullets: TAM: Global short-stay + adjacent experience cross-sell.

slides.title: Traction & Early Signals (fill once live)
bullets: Activation %, Repeat booking %, Dispute rate, Net supply growth.

slides.title: Business Model
bullets: Take rate on bookings, trust services, pricing optimization upsell.

slides.title: Moat & Defensibility
bullets: Reputation graph depth, fraud data corpus, regulatory expertise flywheel.

slides.title: Go-To-Market
bullets: City seeding → host ambassador loops → review velocity engine.

slides.title: Financial Ask & Use of Funds
bullets: Engineering (trust + pricing), market expansion, regulatory compliance buffer.
24 month runway; milestones: X bookings, Y cities, Z% repeat.
Appendix: Risk matrix, regulatory playbook, trust architecture diagram.
